title: Sum List Based on Function
description: In this lab, you will learn how to use the `map()` function to apply a function to each element of a list and the `sum()` function to calculate the sum of the modified values, and then implement a function that takes a list and a function as arguments, maps each element of the list to a value using the provided function, and returns the sum of the values.

meta.title: Sum List Based on Function in Python
meta.description: Learn how to use map() and sum() functions to apply a function to each element of a list and calculate the sum of the values.
